verbose_text: It has been shown that inhibition of angiotensin receptors-1 with the clinically approved small-molecule losartan or other antagonists impairs activation of CAFs, leading to decreased CAF density and CAF mediated production of hyaluronan and collagen XREF_BIBR, which enhances the penetration and efficacy of nanotherapeutics XREF_BIBR.
evidence: CAF-mediated production of hyaluronan and collagen
